name: Large Bedroom
longDesc:
Uh-oh! You are in the large bedroom, which belongs to your parents. You are definitely not supposed to be in here!
But you're doing a lot of stuff today that you're not supposed to do, so why stop now?
A bed is pushed against the far wall.
It's huge, wooden, and intricately carved.
The room also contains a fireplace and a desk with lots of papers on it.
description:
You are in the large bedroom, which belongs to your parents.
It contains a bed, a desk, and a fireplace.
The doorway leads to the Upstairs Hallway.

fireplace.name: fireplace
fireplace.description:
The fireplace is brick and covered in years of soot.
Through the grate, you can faintly see light coming up from the living room.

bed.name: bed
bed.description: The bed is old, heavy, and dark, with no fewer than three quilts and six pillows piled on top of it.

desk.name: desk
desk.description: Your parents' desk is covered in post-it notes, not just on the top of the desk but also down the sides.
desk.discoveryStatement: On one side of the desk, near the floor, is a yellow post-it with some writing on it.

post-it.name: post-it
post-it.description:
The post-it is old and crumpled and might be structurally supporting the desk.
Maybe you should LOOK more closely at it.
post-it.discoveryStatement: Oooh, is that a password? Yes it is! You should probably TAKE that down.

password.name: password
password.description: You'll need a password to the computer in the basement lab, and this is it.
